title: How to make a clean karaoke from a song - Quora

response.answer_text: There are softwares which can remove vocals from a song. However, only stereo songs can be processed also depending on how the stereo of the song is separated. About 85% of the vocals, not 100%, can be diminished. But any, or all other sounds coming in the same frequency and position along with the vocals, will also be removed. Vocal removing software will give you a basic track needed for practicing, not performance. So, you cannot get clean karaoke from original song. :)
guy...just search the song's karaoke from you tube.. just copy the url to the YouTube to mp3 Converter or similar site ..download....n rock../...                    \m/,
